issue.title: [C++] Update to LLVM and Clang bits to 7.0
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3972](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3972). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As `llvmlite`, the other package in the Python ecosystem moved to LLVM 7, we should follow along to avoid problems when we use it in the same Python environment as Gandiva.

Reference: https://github.com/numba/llvmlite/pull/412
